sentences.en: All the researchers on the project are sworn to secrecy.
sentences.cn: 该项目的所有研究人员都按要求起誓保守秘密.

sentences.en: Despite its prevalence, schizophrenia has existed behind a wall of secrecy for years.
sentences.cn: 尽管精神分裂症患者为数众多，但多年来这种病一直被捂着掩着。

sentences.en: His work was shrouded in secrecy .
I can rely on his secrecy.
sentences.cn: 我相信他不会泄漏秘密.

sentences.en: I must stress the need for absolute secrecy about the project.
sentences.cn: 我必须强调这项计划一定要绝对保密。

sentences.en: Ministers are as keen as ever to wrap their activities in a shroud of secrecy.
sentences.cn: 部长们都一如既往地迫切想要将他们的行动搞得神神秘秘的。

sentences.en: Officials tend to tilt toward secrecy from a parochial view of their responsibilities.
sentences.cn: 官吏出于狭隘的责任观念往往倾向于保密.

sentences.en: Perhaps, when you've heard me out, you'll appreciate the reason for secrecy.
sentences.cn: 也许当你听我把话讲完后，你就会明白为什么要保密了。

sentences.en: She was bursting to announce the news but was sworn to secrecy.
sentences.cn: 她急不可待想宣布这个消息，但却发过誓要守口如瓶。

sentences.en: Such secrecy breeds and encourages fear and suspicion.
sentences.cn: 如此保密的做法滋生并加剧了人们的恐惧和疑虑。

sentences.en: The congressman was accused of a breach of secrecy rules.
sentences.cn: 这位议员被控违反了保密规定。

sentences.en: the need for absolute secrecy in this matter
sentences.cn: 在这件事情上绝对保密的必要性

sentences.en: The organization is cloaked in a shroud of secrecy.
sentences.cn: 这个组织笼罩着一种诡秘的气氛。

sentences.en: The secrecy and swiftness of the invasion shocked and amazed army officers.
sentences.cn: 这次入侵的隐秘和迅速令陆军军官们大为震惊。

sentences.en: the veil of secrecy that covered the talks
sentences.cn: 笼罩在会谈上的神秘面纱

sentences.en: They have been accused of secrecy and high-handedness in their dealings.
sentences.cn: 他们被指控隐瞒信息和强制交易。
他们依照要求起誓保密。

words.tran_cn: 秘密的；偷偷摸摸的；促进分泌的

trans.tran_cn: 保密，保密能力，秘密（状态），守秘密
trans.tran_en: the process of keeping something secret, or when something is kept a secret
